title: Brett Waller
text:
Brett Waller is an English <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays for the <a href="Newcastle%20Thunder">Newcastle Thunder</a> in <a href="Betfred%20League%201">Betfred League 1</a>. His position is prop.
He has previously played for <a href="Newcastle%20Thunder">Gateshead Thunder</a>, <a href="Doncaster%20R.L.F.C.">Doncaster</a>, <a href="York%20City%20Knights">York City Knights</a>, and with amateur club <a href="Skirlaugh">Skirlaugh</a>. He re-signed to Newcastle Thunder from York in November 2016 having previously played for the Gateshead Thunder until 2012.
